title: Digital advertising revenue of leading online companies 2012 to 2019
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 5 different Platforms on X-axis for 8 groups 2012, 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Revenue in billion U.S. dollars.
For Platform Google, 2019 had the highest Revenue in billion U.S. dollars 13481.0 among the 8 groups and in AOL, 2015 had the lowest Revenue in billion U.S. dollars 0.0.
The maximum Revenue in billion U.S. dollars for 2017 that was found in Platform Google was 9558.0 times larger than the minimum Revenue in billion U.S. dollars observed in Platform AOL.

On average, the Platform Google had the highest Revenue in billion U.S. dollars for all 8 groups 2012, 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019. Whereas AOL had the lowest average Revenue in billion U.S. dollars.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Revenue in billion U.S. dollars on the Y-axis for 5 different Platforms for 8 groups 2012, 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019 that are presented on the X-axis.
For Platform Google, 2019 had the highest Revenue in billion U.S. dollars 13481.0 among the 8 groups and in AOL, 2015 had the lowest Revenue in billion U.S. dollars 0.0.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 5 different Platforms on X-axis for 8 groups 2012, 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Revenue in billion U.S. dollars.
For Platform Google, 2019 had the highest Revenue in billion U.S. dollars 13481.0 among the 8 groups and in AOL, 2015 had the lowest Revenue in billion U.S. dollars 0.0.
The maximum Revenue in billion U.S. dollars for 2017 that was found in Platform Google was 9558.0 times larger than the minimum Revenue in billion U.S. dollars observed in Platform AOL.

max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 5 different Platforms on X-axis for 8 groups 2012, 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Revenue in billion U.S. dollars.
Out of all 8 groups, 2019 had the highest Revenue in billion U.S. dollars for Platform Google and 2015 had the lowest Revenue in billion U.S. dollars for Platform AOL.
Among all the Platforms, 2017 had the highest Revenue in billion U.S. dollars in Platform Google and lowest Revenue in billion U.S. dollars in Platform AOL.
The maximum Revenue in billion U.S. dollars for 2017 that was found in Platform Google was 9558.0 times larger than the minimum Revenue in billion U.S. dollars observed in Platform AOL.

Among the groups, 2018 had the biggest difference in Revenue in billion U.S. dollars. Where the maximum Revenue in billion U.S. dollars was 11646.0 times larger than the minimum Revenue in billion U.S. dollars.
2019 had the maximum Revenue in billion U.S. dollars out of all 8 groups in Platform Google followed by 2019 in Google, and the minimum Revenue in billion U.S. dollars is found for 2015 in AOL.

On average, the Platform Google had the highest Revenue in billion U.S. dollars for all 8 groups 2012, 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, and 2019. Whereas AOL had the lowest average Revenue in billion U.S. dollars.
